languages.text: {n}Мои слова пугают их. Ранят, потому что они справедливы. И оттого их гнев вспенивается еще сильнее.{/n}
{n}My words frighten them — wound them — because they are just. And that makes their anger swell all the more.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Мои слова пугают их. Ранят, потому что они справедливы. И оттого их гнев вспенивается еще сильнее.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}My words frighten them. Hurt them, because my words are just. And that makes their anger swell even more.{/n}
{n}My words frighten them. Hurt them, because my words are just. And that makes their anger swell even more.{/n}
{n}My words frighten them — wound them — because they are just. And that makes their anger swell all the more.{/n}
{n}My words frighten them — wound them — because they are just. And that makes their anger swell all the more.{/n}
{n}My words frighten them — wound them — because they are just. And that makes their anger swell all the more.{/n}
{n}My words frighten them — wound them — because they are just. And that makes their anger swell all the more.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Meine Worte verängstigen sie – verletzen sie –, weil es aufrechte Worte sind. Und das lässt ihre Wut noch mehr anschwellen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}My words frighten them — wound them — because they are just. And that makes their anger swell all the more.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Meine Worte verängstigen sie – verletzen sie –, weil es aufrechte Worte sind. Und das lässt ihre Wut noch mehr anschwellen.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Mis palabras les amedrentan, les hieren, porque son ciertas. Y eso hace que su enfado crezca aún más.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}My words frighten them — wound them — because they are just. And that makes their anger swell all the more.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Mis palabras les amedrentan, les hieren, porque son ciertas. Y eso hace que su enfado crezca aún más.{/n}

languages.text: {n}私の言葉は彼らを怯えさせ…傷つける…彼らは正しい。それから、彼らの怒りはさらに膨れ上がるのだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}My words frighten them — wound them — because they are just. And that makes their anger swell all the more.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}私の言葉は彼らを怯えさせ…傷つける…彼らは正しい。それから、彼らの怒りはさらに膨れ上がるのだ。{/n}

languages.text: {n}我的话吓到了他们，伤害了他们，因为他们有充分的理由感到愤怒。我的话语让他们更加怒不可遏。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}My words frighten them — wound them — because they are just. And that makes their anger swell all the more.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}我的话吓到了他们，伤害了他们，因为他们有充分的理由感到愤怒。我的话语让他们更加怒不可遏。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Mes paroles les effraient... les blessent... car elles sont justes. Et cela ne fait qu'accroître leur colère.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}My words frighten them — wound them — because they are just. And that makes their anger swell all the more.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Mes paroles les effraient... les blessent... car elles sont justes. Et cela ne fait qu'accroître leur colère.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Sözlerim onları korkutuyor, hatta yaralıyor çünkü her kelimesinde hakikat yatıyor. Bu da öfkelerini gittikçe daha da köpürtüyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}My words frighten them — wound them — because they are just. And that makes their anger swell all the more.{/n}
